name: WinDbg
description: A powerful Windows debugger developed by Microsoft. It can be used to troubleshoot and debug various issues in Windows-based applications and drivers.

name: Autopsy
description: An open-source digital forensics platform that can be used to conduct investigations on Windows, Mac, and Linux systems.

name: Volatility 2
description: An advanced memory forensics framework that can be used to analyze memory dumps of Windows, Linux, and Mac systems.

name: Volatility 3
description: The next generation of the Volatility memory forensics framework. It provides improved performance and supports the analysis of new operating systems.

name: Magnet AXIOM
description: A digital forensics tool that can be used to recover digital evidence from various sources, including smartphones, cloud services, and computers.

name: FTK Imager
description: A powerful imaging tool that can be used to create forensic images of hard drives and other storage devices.

name: Registry Dumper
description: A tool used to extract and dump the contents of the Windows Registry.

name: Extundelete
description: Used for recovering lost data from mountable images
